Pageantry
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK 'Introduction to Act III of Lohengrin' - Wagner, arr. Denis Wright: 1 Mount Charles, 190 2 Camborne, 189 3 Bodmin, 188 4 St Austell, 187
Best Player: John Hitchens, Euphonium, Camborne
Best Soprano: Mark Medlyn, St Austell Best Solo Cornet: Aaron Harvey, Bodmin Best Euphonium: John Hitchins, Camborne Best Solo Horn: Mark Letcher, Bodmin Best Set of Basses: Bodmin
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Sharon Davey, Steven Fryett
Deportment (judge WO Roberts): 1 Bugle (Class B) 2 Indian Queens (Class C)
